title: Divine Lakshmi Kasu Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Rubies. Crafted with traditional Hyderabadi polish for a lustrous finish and enhanced durability. Hallmarked for gold purity.
features: This exquisite Kasu Haaram features a central Lakshmi pendant, intricately detailed with divine precision. The coin-inspired design is adorned with sparkling CZ diamonds. Includes three circular pendants with flower designs in the middle crafted using emeralds and rubies. The design is elevated by the graceful cascading style of the CZs.
occasions: and significant family events. Ideal for the bride who cherishes tradition with a touch of modern elegance.
description: This Kasu Haaram is more than just jewelry; it is a symbol of prosperity and blessings. The Lakshmi pendant invokes divine grace, while the brilliant CZ diamonds add a contemporary sparkle. The rich gold finish and detailed craftsmanship ensure that this piece will be treasured for generations. This is a statement piece, blending heritage with modern design seamlessly.
